Home » 40P21 Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
4 Nahetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Nahetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika
9.
20Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ.
21Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ.
22Nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ.
